3: Don't touch me... Leave me be... I'm fine—I-I'm fine...
(Sways back and forth) The Queen... The Queen...
Why would they station so many guards here to watch the humans?
From the way they look, they're already...
Won't do it again... w-won't do it again!
I've removed the circular component in gold, which seems to be a piece of hardware-hacking device.
Combat logs of the Goldfinches also show that their hardware was hacked before their M.I.N.D.s were destroyed.
...Perhaps all these mechanoid guards are also the victims of the Golden Vortex like these humans.
I can't do nothing when they're all suffering here.
